```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(tidyverse)
library(EpiDynamics)
```

```{r}
parameters = list(beta = 2.2,
                  sigma = 0.192, gamma = 0.434,
                  mu = 0.00005)
initials = c(S = 0.8,
             E = 0.2,
             I = 0,
             R = 0)
seir = SEIR(pars = parameters,init = initials, time = 0:50) # time unit is day
PlotMods(seir)
```
